goal.ch:
“本課程為協助大學部高年級學生瞭解經濟發展??，以作為瞭解國家經濟發展的重要基礎。課程內容分三大部分：
第一部份介紹經濟發展的基本原則與概?，包括全球架構下的經濟發展概?、開發中國家的發展比較、古典經濟發展??、及當前經濟發展??；
第二部份介紹開發中國家面對的問題及其政策，包括貧窮與所得不均、人口成長與經濟發展、?市化與城鄉移民、人?資源、農業轉型與農村發展、環境、及發展決策；
第三部份介紹全球化之下國家面對的問題與政策，包括貿???與發展策?、國際收支與國際債務、國際?融與投資、?融與財政體系、及全球化的一些辯思。(視課程安排)“
goal.en:
“The course aims to introduce students to the theories of economic development which be used as the foundation of understanding national economic development. The course is classified into three parts.
First, we will introduce basic principles and concepts of economic development, including the concept of economic development under the framework of globalization, comparative analyses on development across developing countries, classical development theories, and contemporary development theories.
The second part introduces the current problems faced by developing countries and policies they adopted. These problems include poverty and income inequality, demography and economic development, urbanization and rural-urban immigration, human resource, agriculture transformation and rural area development, environmental issues, and development strategies.  
  The third part introduces issues countries encountered under the globalization and their policies. These topics contain trade theory and development strategies, balance of payments and international debts, international finance and investment, and some debates regarding globalization.“
